MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA4 postcode area of Warrington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:12PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:09am on 17th January
